title: App may crash on logout

milestone.title: 1.25.0 - Alpha
milestone.description:
This release should feature:

- General polish:
  further polish of messaging/communities/onboarding/profile"
  Finish resolving all the issues identified during the Porto Sprint
  Fix the UI polish issues that Pedro and Francesca are going to report against 1.24
  Ensure that joining a community where the "Request to join required" setting is OFF works
  Fix syncing with Desktop bugs

- Get the old wallet operational and initial work related to the new wallet

- Security and privacy
  Allow user to change their password

body:
# Bug Report


## Problem 
Caught by e2e.
Reproduced rather rarely, but on both IOS/Android from time to time (however not sure that the error itself is the same) 

#### Expected behavior

no crash 

#### Actual behavior

Video in tests: https://app.eu-central-1.saucelabs.com/tests/948ebce8aad2400e9dfcbfdbdd5f9e39?auth=153cd20383ba9739023bc91e5903fab2#207
From 07:43:

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/4557972/11cd02d5-a033-4e87-9f2c-bf4de0a7ff9c


### Reproduction

1. Open profile
2. Logout

### Additional Information

- Status version: nightly 
- Operating System: Android, iOS
- Logs: [logcat (17).log](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/files/12440492/logcat.17.log)




[comment]: # (Please, add logs/notes if necessary)

